items.sentence: It's important that we hire someone who speaks French.
A torpedo sunk the ship that Tom's grandfather was on.
Tom's mother made the shirt that he was wearing today.
A gust of wind knocked one of the vases off the table.
It might be harder to do that than you think it'll be.
How did you find out that Tom didn't enjoy doing that?
I was hoping Tom wouldn't ask me to help Mary do that.
I thought you knew Tom didn't have a driver's license.
I wonder if Tom has ever asked Mary why she got fired.
I'm sure Tom will be happy to show you how to do that.
Tom and Mary did that together as often as they could.
Tom has been seeing a psychiatrist three times a week.
About how many hours will it take to get there by car?
It isn't a good idea to go out after dark by yourself.
It's not much fun going mountain climbing by yourself.
It would probably be difficult to do that by yourself.
It means a lot to me to know you did that just for me.
I know Tom isn't planning to go to Australia with you.
I knew Tom wouldn't want to go to Australia with Mary.
I thought Tom was going to be in Australia last month.
